pages.text: Foxhounds can be found in the Nether. They will attack you and set you on fire.$(br2)You can tame this creatures, drinking a Fire Resistance Potion, and then, feed it with Coal to tame it.$(br2)Tamed Foxhounds are like regular wolfs, but with some extra features: $(li)They'll sleep on hot blocks, like magma.
$(li)If put on top of a Furnace, they'll make the furnace faster.
